blademaster:RandomBladePerkBlight.NAME: Perk: Blades
DESCRIPTION: At the start of each combat, channel #b1 random #yBlade.

blademaster:RandomDefensiveStancePerkBli.NAME: Perk: Defensive Stance Mastery
DESCRIPTION: At the start of combat, switch your #yDefensive #yStance to a random #yStance.

blademaster:RandomStancePerkBlight.NAME: Perk: Offensive Stance Mastery
DESCRIPTION: At the start of combat, switch your #yStance to a random #yStance.

blademaster:FinisherDrawCardPerkBlight.NAME: Perk: Finisher Mastery
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a #rFinisher, draw 1 card.

blademaster:StanceHealPerkBlight.NAME: Perk: Healthy Stances
DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat,heal #b6 HP if you're in a Stance.

blademaster:ComboEveryTurnPerkBlight.NAME: Perk: Alacrity
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain #b1 #yCombo.

blademaster:FuryEveryTurnPerkBlight.NAME: Perk: Endless Rage
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain #b5 #yFury.

blademaster:OnAttackedChargePerkBlight.NAME: Perk: Hypercharge
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you're attacked, if you're in a #yStance, gain #b1 #yCharge.

blademaster:WindChargePerkBlight.NAME: Perk: Wind Stance Mastery
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you're in #gWind #gStance gain 3 #gWind #gCharges if you have none. Otherwise, gain 1 #gWind #gCharge.

blademaster:LightningChargePerkBlight.NAME: Perk: Lightning Stance Mastery
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you're in #bLighting #bStance gain 3 #bLighting #bCharges if you have none. Otherwise, gain 1 #bLighting #bCharge.

blademaster:BleedingMoreDamagePerkBlight.NAME: Perk: Deep Cuts
DESCRIPTION: #yBleeding enemies take #b30% more damage rather than #b20%.
